play2:coffee-compile

Full name:

com.google.code.play2-maven-plugin:play2-maven-plugin:1.0.0-alpha2:coffee-compile

Description:

Compile Coffee Script assets

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Since version: 1.0.0.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: generate-resources.

Parameters

(no parameters)
